g.text: Project setup, CI and other small tasks
not directly related to an epic
We want to be able to hook into
Connect UART packet buffer to UART receive to
Connect FIFO to UART transmit to consume
Connect UART PacketStream source to RGMII
Connect UART PacketStream sink to RGMII
We want to be able to use FPGA internal
We want the core to handle the
We want the core to support XSGMII
We want the core to handle the
We want to able to route MAC stream
We want the core to handle the address
Send out ARP request on missing ARP table
Implement top-level ARP circuit which uses
Add gateway support to ARP circuit
We want the core to handle the internet
Connect IP packetizer to ARP circuit
We want the core to respond to Internet
We want the core to respond to user
We want the core to handle DHCP
